Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Hello web crawlers!

The latest release for HBase-Writer is now available for download:
http://code.google.com/p/hbase-writer/

This latest version supports Hbase/Hadoop 0.20.x and has a few changes from
the previos 0.19.x version.  Please check out the project site and README
for details.

Thanks to everyone on #HBase for help in testing this out and getting it
ready for release.

Enjoy!
The HBase-Writer Team

--0016e6d784e3fa6da50475e95d38
Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1
